channel.title: Best 508 source and client?
channel.description: which ones the best?? I need a 508 with customs like... pvp armour. claws. b scimmy. custom colored objects, lunar, etc etc. I like customs A LOT :P soooo... which ones the best??

item.title: Best 508 source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

EscapeTheF8:

I need a 508 with customs like… pvp armour. claws. b scimmy. custom colored objects, lunar, etc etc.

Unless I’m mistaken, I don’t think 508s have customs. If they do, then I seriously doubt the creator is going to release the open source version of the game. :|. I would suggest finding a blank 508 server and client and start from scratch.

To find a blank server and client, look in the Server Downloads forum.

Read full topic
